Description.Text: Facilities The hotel features 96 accommodation units. Services and facilities at the hotel include internet access, wireless internet access, a conference room and a business centre. Guests can use the parking spaces if required. Rooms The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, a kitchen and a bathroom. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a sofa-bed. Guests will find a kitchenette provided for their use. Internet access, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. The bathroom features a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment Sport and leisure options are offered by the hotel and third-party operators. An outdoor pool is available to guests. The hotel offers guests leisure options, including a gym (no extra charge). Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B.
